title: Strings of Passion
plot: Three college friends share their recent developments in their respective lives after three years of separation.
synopsis: Strings of Passion is a story of three youths grappling with their own unique situations that make their life go through a emotional roller coaster ride. From winning concerts to winning his fathers fiancée and from writing poems for band to writing a poem for his girl friend and winning her heart, Strings of Passion will take you on a different high through the most romantic, embarrassing and even thought-provoking moments onscreen. Life seems all good until one day when one of the guys ends up in a ghastly gruesome incident that changes the course of their lives.A drama of love, life and passion set in the City of Joy, Kolkata, India; Strings of Passion is the story of Neel, Aman and Amit 3 young and dynamic guys who run the band "Strings of Passion" but are shadowed by the influences of drugs, broken love and bad parenting. However, these three friends have one thing in common - their love for music and life. Apparently instigated by college blues, they run a ruthless period of drugs, depression & desolation until 3 women in their lives create magic and rejuvenate them to sensible human beings.
